description: This source file defines the LoginActivity class, which provides a user interface for login and registration functionality in an Android application. It manages user input, toggles between login and register modes, interacts with an AuthRepository for authentication, and navigates to MainActivity upon success.

classes.name: LoginActivity
classes.description: A subclass of AppCompatActivity providing login and registration UI and logic.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets the theme and layout, sets up UI event handlers, and manages login/register mode toggling.

methods.name: updateMode
methods.description: Updates UI elements to reflect whether the activity is in login or registration mode.
